column1: Little Goat Diner////I was super excited to try this because I like comfort food with a little creativity. The menu is a little overwhelming
column2: but i settled on the fat elvis waffles and wasn't wowed. All of the components were good
column3: but all together it was a little much. the peanut butter butter was way too rich to enjoy
column4: and combined with the waffles just didn't do it for me. I'm definitely not someone who doesn't love sugar
column5: either. I have quite the sweet tooth. I just kind of felt it was over-hyped. Maybe I should've gotten a burger or something? Â I probably wont go back. Also
